H0.text: Liquid has a fixed volume but not a fixed shape.

H1.text: Mixture is a form of matter that has a fixed volume but not a fixed shape.

H2.text: Gas is the form of matter that has a fixed volume but not a fixed shape.

H3.text: Solid is the form of matter that has a fixed volume but not a fixed shape.

A4.text: Liquid is a state of matter with a definite volume but no fixed shape. When resting in a container, liquids typically adapt to the shape of the container.

A5.text: The volume of a quantity of liquid is fixed by its temperature and pressure.
